children.value: 将类型中所有属性转换成为可选属性。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Partial<T> = { [P in keyof T]?: T[P] }

children.value: 将类型中所有类型转换为必选属性，与 Partial 相对。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Required<T> = { [P in keyof T]-?: T[P] }

children.value: 将类型中所有属性设为只读。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Readonly<T> = { readonly [P in keyof T]: T[P]} }

children.value: 构造一个属性的值其类型皆为某种特定类型的类型。有点类似声明 C++ 中的 map，如

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Record<K extends keyof any, T> = { [P in K]: T }

children.value: 从类型中选取部分属性构造出一个新类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Pick<T, K extends keyof any> = { [P in K]: T[P] }

children.value: 从类型中排除指定属性，用剩下的属性构造一个新类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Omit<T, K extends keyof any> = Pick<T, Exclude<keyof T, K>>

children.value: 从类型中排除指定项，再用剩下的项构造一个新类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Exclude<T, U> = T extends U ? never : T

children.value: 取类型的交集，与 Exclude 相对。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Extract<T, U> = T extends U ? T : never

children.value: 去除类型中的 null 和 undefined 类型，用剩下的项返回一个新类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type NonNullable<T> = T extends null | undefined ? never : T

children.value: 获取函数参数的类型组成的元组类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Parameters<T extends (...args: any) => any> = T extends (...args: infer P) ? P : never

children.value: 返回函数的返回值的类型组成的元组类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type ReturnType<T extends (...args: any) => any> = T extends (...args: any) => infer P ? P : never

children.value: 判断两种类型是否相等，分别返回 A 和 B。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type IfEquals<X, Y, A = X, B = never> =
  (<T>() => T extends X ? 1 : 2) extends
  (<T>() => T extends Y ? 1 : 2) ? A : B

children.value: Primitive 包含 JS 中的原始类型，有着对应的类型守卫 isPrimitive。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai

children.value: Falsy 类型包含了 JS 中的幻假值（除了 NaN），有着对应的类型守卫 isFalsy。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type Falsy = null | undefined | '' | 0 | false

const isFalsy = (val: unknown): val is Falsy => !val

children.value: Nullish 用来指代 JS 中的空值，有着对应的类型守卫 isNullish。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type Nullish = null | undefined

const isNullish = (val: unknown): val is Nullish => val == null

children.value: 两种类型的交集，同内置类型 Extract。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type SetIntersection<A, B> = A extends B ? A : never

children.value: A 类型与 B 类型的差集，同内置类型 Exclude。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type SetDifference<A, B> = A extends B ? never : A

children.value: 两种类型的补集，要求 A1 为 A 的子集。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type SetComplement<A, A1 extends A> = SetDifference<A, A1>

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type SymmetricDifference<A, B> = SetDifference<A | B, A & B>

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type NonUndefined<A> = A extends undefined ? never : A

type NonNullable<A> = A extends undefined ? never : A extends null ? never : A

children.value: 求类型中属性值类型为函数的属性集合。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai

children.value: RequiredKeys 将类型中必选属性的集合组成新类型，与之相对应有 OptionalKeys。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai

children.value: ReadonlyKeys 将类型中只读属性的集合转化为新类型，与之对应有 MutableKeys，将类型中可变属性的集合转化为新类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type ReadonlyKeys<T extends object> = {
  [K in keyof T]: IfEquals<
    { [P in K]: T[K] },
    { -readonly [P in K]: T[K] },
    never,
    P
  >
}[keyof T]

type MutableKeys<T extends object> = {
  [K in keyof T]: IfEquals<
    { [P in K]: T[K] },
    { -readonly [P in K]: T[K] },
    P,
    never
  >
}[keyof T]

children.value: PickByValue 用来取类型中的匹配某值的属性及其值组合成新类型，与之类似的 PickByValueExact 匹配值时使用更加严格的“集合相等”策略。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type PickByValue<T, ValueType> = Pick<
  T,
  { [K in T]: T[K] extends ValueType ? K : never }[keyof T]
>

type PickByValueExact<T, ValueType> = Pick<
  T,
  { [K in T]: [T[K]] extends [ValueType] ? [ValueType] extends [T[K]] ? K : never : never}[keyof T]
>

children.value: 取两种类型共有属性及其值组合成新的类型。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code: type Intersection<T extends object, P extends object> = Pick<T, Extract<keyof T, keyof P>>

children.value: Subtract 从类型 T 中移除其子集 T1 中所有的属性，再组成新类型。Diff 与之类似，但不要求 T1 为子集。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type Subtract<T, T1> = Pick<T, SetComplement<keyof T, keyof T1>>

type Diff<T, P> = Pick<T, SetDifference<keyof T, keyof P>>

children.value: Assign 类似 Object.assign，使新类型中的属性及值覆盖原有类型的属性及值。Overwrite 与 Assign 类似，但不会给原有类型添加新的属性。

props.className: language-ts shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter github-light github-dark monokai
props.code:
type Assign<T, P,
  I = Diff<T, P> & Intersection<P, T> & Diff<P, T>
> = Pick<I, keyof I>

type Overwrite<T, P,
  I = Diff<T, P> & Intersection<P, T>
> = Pick<I, keyof I>
